channel.title: EBPF on Hanshal Mehta
channel.description: Recent content in EBPF on Hanshal Mehta

item.title: An Introduction to eBPF
item.description: Motivation In this blog series, we will deep dive into the fascinating world of eBPF (Extended Berkley Packet Filter) and its internals. Along the way, we will explore core BPF (Berkley Packet Filter) internals that are essential to understanding how eBPF operates under the hood. This journey will also include networking concepts, operating system principles, and computer architecture, all of which play a crucial role in making eBPF effective and powerful.
